text: mariyam ke bete maseeh to bas ek rasool hain aur unake qabl (aur bhee) bahutere rasool guzar chuke hain aur unakee mo bhee (khuda kee) ek sachchee bandee thee (aur aadamiyon kee tarah) ye donon (ke donon bhee) khaana khaate the (ai rasool) gaur to karo ham apane ehakaam inase kaisa saaf saaf bayaan karate hain
